tvmega_recap: Frank and Darci help out at Company. Darci offers to chip in for Marina's college fund. Darci calls Frank her boyfriend. Frank is pleased. Marah and Josh meet and talk about her trip to Italy and Reva. Eden and Tony set out to prove she is innocent. They head to NY to see Vinnie Salerno. Shayne and Marina prepare to have a romantic dinner. They get cozy. Marina tells Shayne that she regrets not being with him last year. Marina is kidnapped by Ben. Stay tuned.
